borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Installation of a rooflight, on top of the main flat roof at roof level; alterations within the existing second floor roof terrace to include, installation of new crittal style French doors to replace existing French doors to the side elevation, removal of existing chimney stack, and erection of new glass balustrade around the perimeter following the removal of existing railings; alterations to the front elevation to include, installation of moulding to an existing window at first floor level, installation of 2no. new windows with moulding following the removal of existing garage door at ground floor level, removal of existing driveway access and levelling the floor level, increasing the height of existing low level brick built front boundary wall by 0.5m, erection of a new low level brick built front boundary wall with railings on top and installation of a new front garden access gate with railings; re-sizing and replacement of an existing window, to the rear elevation of existing first floor back addition; erection of a new gazed side infill roof with exposed timber joists to the existing single storey rear extension; alterations to the opening and installation of new crittall style steel doors with sidelights to replace existing folding doors, to the rear elevation at ground floor level; formation of a new opening and installation of timber garden access gate, to the side boundary wall fronting Kingwood Road.
